parameter.name: usernameForSearch
parameter.description: the username of the user for whom we require details

parameter.name: startAt
parameter.description: the index of the first user to return (0-based)

parameter.name: maxResults
parameter.desciption: the maximum number of users to return (defaults to 50). The maximum allowed value is 1000.

parameter.name: includeActive
parameter.description: If true, then active users are included in the results (default true)

parameter.name: includeInactive
parameter.description: If true, then inactive users are included in the results (default false)
